|brand = ASUS |model = RT-AC1900 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = (C1) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1900 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = MSQ-RTACHC00 |icid = 3568A-RTACHC00CAN |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4709A0;BCM4709A0KFEBG; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARMv7 |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S34ML01G200TFI00; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = ESMT;M15F2G16128A-BDB; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = D0:17:C2 |oui = D0:17:C2
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = CFE;;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.36;brcmarm;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 19 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.75 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes |jtag = yes
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = ASUS Router App, AiCloud support |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS, ASUS_5G |defaultssid_regex = ^ASUS$,,, ^ASUS 5G$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Arcadyan |manuf_model = WG9117A |manuf_rev = AC33 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Asuswrt-Merlin
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/02/2016 |estreldate = 06/03/2016 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 889349349106 |ean = 4712900349108 |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B01GK8ZXDE |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1300 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RTACHC00 MSQ-RTACHC00] (2016-08-02) • [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3083312 FCC Doc] *'''ASUS RT-AC1900''' (R/V2) - CPU: BCM4709A0 (@1.0 GHz Dual Cores) *[[ASUS RT-AC1900P]] - CPU: BCM4709C0 (@1.4 GHz) {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC1900P/ PPage] *[[ASUS RT-AC1900U]] - BCM4708C0 (@1.0 GHz) *[[ASUS RT-AC1750]] (R/W/V2) *[[ASUS RT-AC67U]] (R/W) *[[ASUS RT-AC66U B1]] (V2)
*Dual-core processor for fast and responsive performance :with Wi-Fi, Ethernet and USB devices *Ultra-fast 802.11ac dual-band Wi-Fi router boosts speeds :up to 1900Mbps, 3x faster than 802.11n routers *Broadcom nqam technology increases 802.11n speeds :to 600Mbps for 33% faster performance. *5x Gigabit Ethernet ports for fast wired network connections *AiProtection with Trend Micro for triple-strength network security, :plus robust Parental Controls and privacy protection *ASUS AiCloud lets you access, sync, share and stream :your files anywhere, on any internet-connected device *USB 3.0 port for 10x-faster data transfers than USB 2.0, :also includes one USB 2.0 port *ASUS Router App lets you control your network anywhere, :all without needing to boot up a PC
===Features=== *Airtime Fairness, Adaptive QoS, AiProtection, Parental Control *Dual WAN, IPTV support, Roaming Assist, Guest Network (3x) *VPN server: IPSec Pass-Through, PPTP Pass-Through, :L2TP Pass-Through, PPTP Server, OpenVPN Server *VPN client: PPTP client, L2TP client, OpenVPN client *Mac OS Backup, Enhanced media server (AiPlayer App comp.) :Image: jpeg, Audio: mp3, wma, wav, pcm, mp4, lpcm, ogg :Video: asf, avi, divx, mpeg, mpg, ts, vob, wmv, mkv, mov *AiCloud personal cloud service, 3G/4G data sharing *Printer Server: LPR protocol support :Multifunctional printer support (Windows only) *Download Master: Download scheduling :Support bt, nzb, http, ed2k :Support encryption, DHT, PEX and magnet link :Upload and download bandwidth control *AiDisk file server: :Samba and FTP server with account management
==Links of Interest== [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC1900/specifications/ Specifications]
===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32609-asus-rt-ac68p-dual-band-wireless-ac1900-gigabit-router-reviewed ''ASUS RT-AC68P Wireless-AC1900 Router Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder''']
===Forum threads=== *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/rt-ac68u-rt-ac68p-rt-ac1900-rt-ac1900p.35759/ ''ASUS RT-AC68U/RT-AC68P/RT-AC1900/RT-AC1900P'' on '''SmallNetBuilder''']
==See also== *[[ASUS RT-AC1750]] (A1) - BCM4706 (@600 MHz) *[[ASUS RT-AC1750 B1]] - BCM4708C0 (@1.0 GHz) *'''ASUS RT-AC1900''' (R/V2) - BCM4709A0 (@1.0 GHz) *[[ASUS RT-AC1900P]] - BCM4709C0 (@1.4 GHz) *[[ASUS RT-AC1900U]] - BCM4708C0 (@1.0 GHz) *[[ASUS RT-AC66U B1]] - BCM4708C0 (@1.0 GHz) *[[ASUS RT-AC66U]] (A1) - BCM4706 (@600 MHz) :*[[ASUS RT-AC66R]] (Store by ''Best Buy'') :*[[ASUS RT-AC66W]] (White) *[[ASUS RT-N66U]] (B1) - BCM4706 (@600 MHz) *[[ASUS RT-N66U C1]] - BCM4708C0 (@1.0 GHz) :*[[ASUS RT-AC68P]] {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RTAC68P/ Product Page] :*[[ASUS RT-AC68U]] {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RTAC68U/ Product Page] :*[[ASUS RT-AC68UF]] {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC68UF/ Product Page]
